forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn breaks gently over Downtown San Francisco, with clouds draping the sky in a soft, gray blanket. A lingering hint of drizzle weaves through the air, adding a touch of moisture to the cool morning. As the day unfolds, a flicker of promise emerges—by mid-morning, the clouds are expected to retreat, revealing elongated stretches of blue sky. The temperatures will rise around the mid-60s, ushering in a warmth just shy of outright summer brilliance. An invigorating west-southwest breeze sweeps through the city, rustling leaves and filling coastal air with a hint of salt.

Fog creeps softly at the edges of the sylvan hills and might cast a gentle embrace toward the ocean, signaling the subtle dance of the marine layer. As the sun climbs higher, the fog should recede, yielding clearer vistas. An ideal day calls for a light jacket in the morning, perfect for strolling along the Embarcadero as the city begins to pulsate with life. A late-morning visit to a local café for a warm cup of coffee would harmonize well with the brisk air, while an afternoon walk could reveal the kaleidoscope of colors as the sun mingles with the urban landscape. Today is ripe for quiet exploration—be it a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or a reflective moment atop a scenic overlook as the city awakens.
